name: Warming (Global Game Jam 2019)
description:
A game about baking a cake in your new flat.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019. Theme: "What home means to you".

Credits:

David Strachan: Programming

Craig Innes:  Dialogue + Programming

Alicja Ukleja - Art

Michael Gillon - Music

(Note: None of us have macs so I've no idea if the mac build works)
